      • openTool

        public void openTool​(boolean setActive)
        Opens the tool's window, shows tool if invisible at the moment. Need to be called in EDT.
        Parameters:
        setActive - determine if tool window must be just opened or additionally became active and attract focus

      • unregister

        public final void unregister()
        Unregister Tool and removes all shortcuts in case of reload. Need to be called in EDT.

        If project is closing (== not in opened projects) {

        }, but there are some other opened projects, than shortcuts must not be removed - instance of BaseTool still exists for other projects and shortcuts are global (registered by ActionId). In case of BaseTool reload (unregister on opened project) we need do this, because it will register (probably changed) shortcuts back on load.

      • doUnregister

        protected void doUnregister()
        Override this method to add implementation specific unregistration. Called in unregister() before default unregister process.
